
\color{blue}

**Solution**. E.\
Adding one parameter in a nested model cannot decrease the maximized log-likelihood, so it can increase the AIC by at most 2 units.
Adjacent pairs $\{(p,q),(p',q')\}$ inconsistent with this are
$\{(3,2),(3,3)\}$,
$\{(2,3),(3,3)\}$,
$\{(2,1),(3,1)\}$,
$\{(2,2),(3,2)\}$.

\color{black}
